name: Buttons and Boxes (Symbol Games)
description:
Buttons and Boxes Description:

Welcome to Buttons and Boxes! The fun and lovable "friendly" puzzle-platformer with your great announcer! Where you'll be promised challenges, humor, adooooorable enemies, and tons. of. FUN...!

(Newest 0.2.0 update, FIXED enemy AI, smoother gameplay, better gameplay overall, more secrets, and even a mysterious cartridge...)

(Here's the link to the GameJolt page for this demo. ;) ):

https://gamejolt.com/games/ButtonsandBoxes/440975

(And here's a link to the Patreon page of this game if you want to donate for some awesome perks within the game!):

https://www.patreon.com/SymbolGamesButtonsAndBoxes
